game.name: Raceborn
game.shortDescription: Raceborn는 다양한 장소에서 미니어처 자동차를 조종하며, 광범위한 차량 커스터마이징 옵션을 제공하는 경주 게임입니다. 경주에서 승리하여 업그레이드를 획득하고 창의성을 발휘하여 경주의 전설이 되십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Raceborn is a racing game featuring miniature cars in diverse locations with extensive vehicle customization options. Win races, earn upgrades, and showcase your creativity to become a racing legend.

reviewHighlights.text: This game takes an old idea: racing with the camera on top that makes the experience of racing different than with the first-person camera. The game d...
It seems to be a good game with pixel graphics, but I do not understand why the developer made such an inconvenient control in the game. It is extreme...
